commands.command: SELECT CompanyName, COUNT(CompanyName) AS CountCoName FROM CustomersTbl GROUP BY CompanyName HAVING COUNT(CompanyName)>1
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, enabled, MachineSN FROM CustomersTbl WHERE CompanyName="Rhodes University Dept of Comp Science"
SELECT CustomerID, COUNT(CustomerID) AS CountID FROM CustomersAccInfoTbl GROUP BY CustomerID HAVING COUNT(CustomerID)>1
ALTER TABLE CustomersAccInfoTbl ADD CONSTRAINT UCID_CustomerID UNIQUE (CustomerID)
ALTER TABLE CustomersTbl ADD CONSTRAINT UCCN_CompanyName UNIQUE (CompanyName)
